Sentence.sentence: The video challenge does not put individual students on the hot seat—so it's less intimidating by design.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In Einstein's day, there were only a few thousand physicists worldwide, and the theoreticians who could intellectually rival Einstein probably would fit into a streetcar with seats to spare.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As you can see, ladies and gentlemen, the guests were seated very informally around this oval table, which would add to the relaxed atmosphere.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I had it down by my feet between me and the man in the next seat.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

means: Sociedad Espanola de Automoviles de Turismo 西班牙旅游车公司

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"坐"之意。
means: seat ： 及物动词，常与反身代词连用，常用过去分词seated形式。
sit ： 多用作不及物动词，用作及物动词时，可与seat换用。

list.explanation: 心情不安，尴尬处境，处于困境

example.en: The poor jerk's on the hot seat for for getting to shut the safe.
example.zh: 那可怜的傻瓜因忘了锁保险柜而坐立不安。

example.en: If you're in the hot seat, he'll fight for you.
example.zh: 假若你有闲难，他会出力相助的。

example.en: A half dozern men are alive today who otherwise would have ridden smoky seat.
example.zh: 六名本来该坐电椅处死的人竞然活到今天。

example.en: He said he wouldn' t take a back seat to anybody, but the President himself.
example.zh: 他说除了总统本人之外，他对谁都不买账。

Sentence.sentence: After spotting a wallet on the front seat inside a parked car with its window down, he stood guard in the rain for about two hours waiting for the owner to return.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As one group of workers carried out the rubbish, another group began removing seats and other theater equipment in preparation for the building's end.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: As the co-founder of the National Young Farmers Coalition NYFC (美国青年农会) and a family farmer myself, I have a front-row seat to the innovations among small farmers that are transforming the industry.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: By the end of the first chapter, requests were coming from the back seat: "Please read a little louder."
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Excuse me, but I think this seat — 16C — is mine.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: He offered his seat to someone else.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: I left my seat quietly, giving him some privacy to finish his conversation.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: It has seats in the open air.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: It was only when the car pulled up in front of our house that we saw Lily in the passenger seat.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Just two seats over, Andrew Mazoleny, a local videographer, is finishing his lunch at the bar.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Leroy Chiao describes what happens even before you float out of your seat, your inner ear thinks you're falling.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: On december 1, 1955, in Montgomery, Alabama, Rosa Parks would not give up her seat on a bus to a passenger.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: She could hardly find her seat.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: She didn't get a favourable seat.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: She said she spotted my wallet on a bus seat.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The show is good, but I could hardly see the stage from my seat.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The vehicle-named the transition – has two seats, four wheels and wings that fold up so it can be driven like a car.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: They float out of their seats unexpectedly.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: Though the movie is 30 years old, most of the 250 seats were filled with teary-eyed audience wanting to say good-bye to the old building.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When his phone rang again later, he left his seat to answer it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Overall, the idea is to let "states remain in the driver's seat for managing the species," Ashe said.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: We were using crates as seats.
sentences.cn: 我们用大木箱作为座位。

means.word_mean: 所在地, 场所; 中心

sentences.en: She won a seat in Parliament at the election.
sentences.cn: 她在选举中赢得了议会中的席位。

means.word_mean: 可供坐的东西，椅子，凳子
(活动、机构等的)中心；(国家、州、省等的)首府，首都
使就座；向…提供座位；落座

sentences.en: The usher seated us in the front row.
sentences.cn: 引座员让我们在前排就座。

sentences.en: She seated herself on the table.
sentences.cn: 她坐在桌子上。

sentences.en: The Queen of that country was seated last year.
sentences.cn: 那个国家的女王是去年登基的。

means.word_mean: 可容纳若干座位；可坐…人；能容纳…人

sentences.en: The theatre seats 2000 persons.
sentences.cn: 剧院能容纳两千人。

means.word_mean: 使获得座位(或席位)；使登基
把…安装在底座上；为…修理底部(或臀位)</seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: sit down, typically in a seat assigned to one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 就座（尤指坐在指定的位置）

phrase.cizu_name: by the seat of (one's) pants&I{【俚语】}

jx.jx_en_mean: In a manner based on intuition and experience rather than method
jx.jx_cn_mean: 凭感觉：基于直觉和经验而不是条理的方式

lj.lj_ly: He ran the business by the seat of his pants.
lj.lj_ls: 他凭经验和直觉做生意

lj.lj_ly: an inexperienced pilot who had to fly the aircraft by the seat of her pants.
lj.lj_ls: 一个不得不徒手驾驶飞机的无经验的飞行员

entry.def: A seat is an object that you can sit on, for example a chair.

example.tran: 斯蒂芬回到自己的座位上。

example.ex: Ann could remember sitting in the back seat of their car.
example.tran: 安记得坐在他们车里的后排座上了。

entry.def: The seat of a chair is the part that you sit on.

example.ex: The stool had a torn, red plastic seat.
example.tran: 那个凳子的红色塑料座面已经破旧不堪。

entry.def: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down.

example.ex: He waved towards a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
example.tran: 他挥手指了指一把椅子，自己在书桌旁坐了下来。

example.ex: ...a portrait of one of his favourite models seated on an elegant sofa.
example.tran: 一幅他最喜欢的模特之一的画像，画中人坐在雅致的沙发上

entry.def: A building or vehicle that seats a particular number of people has enough seats for that number.

example.tran: 那个剧院可容纳 570 人。

entry.def: The seat of a piece of clothing is the part that covers your bottom.

example.ex: Then he got up and brushed off the seat of his jeans.
example.tran: 然后他站起来，拍了拍牛仔裤的臀部。

entry.def: When someone is elected to a parliament, congress, or senate, you can say that they, or their party, have won a seat .

example.ex: Independent candidates won the majority of seats on the local council.
example.tran: 无党派候选人在地方议会选举中赢得了多数席位。

example.ex: ...a Maryland Republican who lost his seat.
example.tran: 一名失掉席位的马里兰州共和党党员

entry.def: If someone has a seat on the board of a company or on a committee, they are a member of it.
entry.tran: (公司董事会、委员会中的)席位，职位

example.ex: He has been unsuccessful in his attempt to win a seat on the board of the company.
example.tran: 他始终未能如愿以偿地在公司董事会中谋得一席之地。

entry.def: The seat of an organization, a wealthy family, or an activity is its base.
entry.tran: (组织、活动的)中心地，所在地;(豪门的)宅邸

example.ex: Gunfire broke out early this morning around the seat of government in Lagos.
example.tran: 今天凌晨在拉各斯的政府大楼周围发生了枪战。

example.ex: ...Weston Park, family seat of the Earl of Bradford.
example.tran: 韦斯顿公园，布拉德福德伯爵的祖宅

entry.def: If you take a back seat, you allow other people to have all the power and to make all the decisions.
entry.tran: 让权于他人;退居次要位置

example.ex: You need to take a back seat and think about both past and future...
example.tran: 你得退居二线，把过去和将来都捋清楚。

example.ex: This is a country where women usually take a back seat.
example.tran: 在这个国家通常是男尊女卑。

entry.def: If you take a seat, you sit down.

example.ex: 'Take a seat,' he said in a bored tone...
Rachel smiled at him as they took their seats on opposite sides of the table.
example.tran: 他们分坐在桌子两边，雷切尔对他微微笑了一下。

means.word_mean: 1. a space reserved for sitting (as in a theater or on a train or airplane);
2. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 3. furniture that is designed for sitting on;

sentences.sentence: "there were not enough seats for all the guests"

means.word_mean: 4. any support where you can sit (especially the part of a chair or bench etc. on which you sit);

sentences.sentence: "he dusted off the seat before sitting down"

means.word_mean: 5. a center of authority (as a city from which authority is exercised)
6. the cloth covering for the buttocks;

sentences.sentence: "the seat of his pants was worn through"

means.word_mean: 1. show to a seat; assign a seat for;

sentences.sentence: "The host seated me next to Mrs. Smith"

means.word_mean: 3. place ceremoniously or formally in an office or position;

sentences.sentence: "there was a ceremony to induct the president of the Academy"

means.word_mean: 4. put a seat on a chair

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a noun): from Old Norse sæti, from the Germanic base of sit. The verb dates from the late 16th cent

means: Sociedad Espanola de Automoviles de Turismo 西班牙旅游车公司

sentences.en: The majority of seats on the board will be held by business representatives.

sentences.en: She won a seat in Parliament at the election.

sentences.cn: 左翼的肯赢得了议会席位.
sentences.en: Red Ken won seat in Parliament.

sentences.cn: 政府可能由于重新组织选区而丧失席位.
sentences.en: The government might lose seats by the reorganization of voting areas.

sentences.cn: 能帮我争取一个备用席位 吗 ?
sentences.en: Could I get a seat on standby?

sentences.cn: 但即便在当时, 作为单一政党的自民党在议会中也占有多数席位.
sentences.en: But even then, the LDP, as a single party, held the most seats in the parliament.

sentences.cn: 兄弟会一个席位也没能赢得.
sentences.en: Not a single seat went to the Brothers.

sentences.cn: 多头方面, 各品种上的主力席位却较为混乱, 其中不乏券商背景期货公司的身影.
sentences.en: Long, the various varieties of the main seat is more chaotic, including futures broker's background image.

sentences.cn: 有四名妇女竞选这个议员席位.
sentences.en: Four women are standing for this seat.

sentences.cn: 他在选举中失去了议会中的席位.
sentences.en: He lost his seat in the Parliament at the election.

sentences.cn: 按照原先的交易条款,中铝公司将得到力拓两个董事会席位.
sentences.en: The original deal would have given Chinalco two board seats.

sentences.cn: 委员会中得到多数席位.
sentences.en: To win a majority of the seat.

sentences.cn: 政客们拼命争夺那席位.
sentences.en: The seat is being hotly contested among politicians.

sentences.cn: 你知道吗,斯通参议员要退休了,他的席位将公开竞选.
sentences.en: Did you know that Senator Stone is retiring and that his seat up for grabs?

sentences.cn: 参议院席位的发配也没有起到作用.
sentences.en: The distribution of Senate seats does not help.

sentences.cn: 他于1961年在韩国国会赢得一个席位.
sentences.en: He won a seat in the National Assembly in 1961.

sentences.cn: 对于一个在拥有微弱优势席位的候选人, 确保这样的选票是很重要的.
sentences.en: For a candidate in a marginal seat, securing that vote is important.

sentences.cn: 政府可能会因为调整选区而失去席位.
sentences.en: The government may lose seats by the reorganization of voting areas.

sentences.cn: 国民党人在议会中新增了6个席位,从而进一步稳固了他们的势力.
sentences.en: The Nationalists entrenched their power further by adding six seats to the Parliament.

sentences.cn: 左翼党派赢得了议会席位.
sentences.en: The pink parties won seat in Parliament.

sentences.cn: 你们选择了将自己与那些盗取了你们存在之真正席位的人相校准.
sentences.en: You have chosen align yourself with those who have purloined the very seat of your existence.

sentences.cn: 政府丢掉20个席位,又赢得了31个席位, 净得席位为11个.
sentences.en: The government lost twenty seats and gained thirty ones , making a net gain of eleven.

sentences.cn: 即使一个固定的乘客人数, 他们还互换席位不时.
sentences.en: Even if a fixed number of passengers, they have also swapped seats from time to time.

sentences.cn: 在四百一十个成员的团体中,法国分得八十一个席位.
sentences.en: France was allocated 8 1 seats out of 410 members body.

sentences.cn: 与MPLA的129个 ( 共有220个 ) 相比,它在现在的议会中占有70个席位.
sentences.en: It currently holds 70 parliamentary seats, to the MPLA's 129 ( of a total of 220 ).

sentences.cn: 许多集团的席位都以欧洲国家为首.
sentences.en: Many group seats are headed by European countries.

sentences.en: The early cars had two seats

sentences.cn: 她说那条蛇一开始从座位 下爬向了后方，她希望它可以一直在那里待着， 让她可以从高速上下来并停车。
sentences.en: She said the snake first slipped back under the seat and she hoped it would stay there until she was able to get out of the high way and stop
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 这个仇我是要报的,你们一个也逃不了.
sentences.en: I'll be revenged on the whole lot of you for this.

sentences.cn: 垫腰节最佳座位的支持和安慰.
sentences.en: Cushioned lumbar section for optimal seating support and comfort.

sentences.cn: 戏剧很有趣,我的座位也很有利,但我没能好好欣赏.
sentences.en: I have a good seat . The play was interesting . I don't enjoy it.

sentences.cn: 在整个飞行中, 他坐在副驾驶员的座位上,全神贯注在狠毒的思索中.
sentences.en: Plunged in dark thought, he sat in the copilot's seat throughout the journey.

sentences.cn: 那个座位是空的 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is that seat free?

sentences.cn: 紧挨着建筑物入口, 楼梯直至阁楼的座位区.
sentences.en: Next to the building entrance, a staircase rises to the seating area above.

sentences.cn: 其实, 我的座位是24A, 是靠窗的位子.
sentences.en: Actually, my seat is 24 A, the window seat.

sentences.cn: 这些座位都没有靠背可倚.
sentences.en: The seats have no back against which to lean.
